state_analysis: Good! Database and tables are now created successfully as the postgres user. Now I need to import the cleaned users and transactions data into the database.
explanation: I'll import the cleaned users CSV and transactions data into the database using the postgres user.

commands.keystrokes: su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c \"\\COPY users FROM '/backup/clean_users.csv' WITH (FORMAT csv, HEADER true);\""
su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users;'"
su - postgres -c "psql -d production_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions;'"
